name: BALLSCAPE (Em1n4)
description:
Ballscape is a local multiplayer and single-player 3D indie game.

It is made because I want everyone who plays it with their friends/family together to have fun.

For now, we have 2 game modes: 

Two-player rumble 

...is played on one computer with two people. The goal is to push the other player off the platform and not fall. The game then resets and loops forever. There are four maps in this game mode. 

100-second survival 

...is played single-player. You need to survive enemies that try to push you off the platform. After 100 seconds of surviving, the golden ball is unlocked, and in order to win you need to touch it. 

There are a lot more plans for this game but this is my main goal. Thank you for reading this and I hope you will have fun playing my game.
